Social Events
Your Perfect Celebration Destination
From joyful family reunions and elegant office holiday parties to unforgettable birthdays, proms, and quinceañeras, Lanier Islands Resort is the perfect place to gather and celebrate. With stunning lakeside views, flexible indoor and outdoor venues, and expert event planning, we make every occasion feel effortless and extraordinary.
Discover how we can help you create lasting memories for your next celebration.
START PLANNING
Previous
Next
Unforgettable Holiday Parties
Make this year’s holiday party one to remember. From sparkling decor and unique entertainment to delicious catering and cozy overnight stays, Lanier Islands Resort has everything you need for a festive celebration your team will never forget.
LEARN MORE
Previous
Next
Family Reunions Made Easy
Bring your family together for an unforgettable reunion at Lanier Islands. With beautiful lakeside accommodations, endless activities for all ages, and plenty of space to gather, it’s the perfect place to relax, reconnect, and create lasting memories.
Previous
Next

From milestone birthdays and unforgettable proms to elegant anniversaries and vibrant quinceañeras, Lanier Islands is the perfect place to celebrate. With stunning venues, customizable catering, and endless ways to make your event unique, we’ll help you create memories that last a lifetime.

Escape to Your Personal Paradise
Our Resort
Embrace the allure of Lanier Islands, nestled just a short drive north of Atlanta, where a true haven awaits. Spanning over 1,200 acres of breathtaking landscapes, this Lake Lanier resort beckons you to explore a world unlike any other, right here at home. From thrilling escapades to lavish comforts, all set amidst nature's finest wonders, your time at Lanier Islands promises to be an unforgettable affair that lingers in your heart long after you bid farewell. Join us on an enchanting journey as we redefine your perception of paradise. Welcome to Lanier Islands, your exclusive retreat in Georgia.
Earn points with every stay at Lanier Islands Resort, and redeem them for unforgettable getaways.
Learn More
Resort Amenities & Services
Game Changer
Join the excitement at Lanier Islands' Game Changer arcade and bar! Fun awaits friends, families, groups, and individuals of all ages. Experience a year-round destination featuring thrilling indoor activities like Virtual Sports Suites, Axe Throwing, Duckpin Bowling, a delightful on-site restaurant, and a plethora of Arcade Games. Whether it's a group outing, party, or a day out with friends, Game Changer guarantees non-stop fun for everyone! Don't miss out – come and play today!
learn more
Heated Pool
The expansive saltwater pool is a refreshing luxury after a long day exploring Lake Lanier, golfing, or playing at the water park. Grab a hand-crafted cocktail from Bullfrog’s convenient poolside service window, then stretch out on a lounge chair or relax in the calming waters. The saltwater lounging pool is an exclusive amenity for guests of the Legacy Lodge, Legacy Villas, and the LakeHouses at Legacy.
Pool Hours
: Open 7AM-10PM, 7 days a week and year-round.
Towels are provided for pool use only. Pool towels must remain in pool area and are not for use at the beach or water park.
Poolside Cabanas
Elevate your day at the pool with a private cabana experience at Lanier Islands Resort. Perfect for up to four guests, each cabana offers shade, comfort, and exclusive amenities including plush towels, bottled water, a whole fruit basket, snacks, and a bottle of sparkling wine.
Available for half-day or full-day rentals, our cabanas are the ultimate way to unwind by the water—whether you're looking for a weekday escape or a weekend treat.
Reserve your cabana by selecting "Cabana Rental" at time of room booking.
Half-day and full-day options available. Weekend rentals run from 12 PM – 8 PM. Rates vary by day. Subject to availability.
Pickleball Courts
Enjoy some outdoor fun and competition with a game of pickleball at our 6-court pickleball venue on Lake Lanier in Buford, GA. Whether you are a beginner who is just now learning the rules of pickleball or a high level competitor looking to face off with the competition... our courts are a perfect destination to play and enjoy some lake views. Free to overnight guests. Equipment provided.
Business Lounge
Nothing will cause you to miss a deadline like a dead laptop or a hard-copy request while you’re traveling. The Legacy Lodge is happy to provide a 24/7 business center with Wi-Fi, charging stations, and a complimentary printer for guests of Legacy Lodge, Legacy Villas, and the LakeHouses at Legacy. Located on the Lobby Level of Legacy Lodge.
Firepits
Nothing warms the soul like a crackling fire pit and a gorgeous view of the stars. Cozy up next to the Legacy Lodge fire pit overlooking Lake Lanier and Legacy Pool. Bullfrogs has Smores kits available year-round if you are in the mood for a warm, sweet treat. If the pits are not lit, simply visit the front desk and they will assist.
Fitness Center
You don’t have to break from your workout routine while you’re staying at Lanier Islands. The Legacy Lodge Fitness Center has everything you need to stay on track with treadmills, stationary bikes, and free weights. Guests of the Legacy Lodge, Legacy Villas, and the LakeHouses at Legacy have exclusive 24/7 access. Located on the first floor of Legacy Lodge.
Parking
There is a $20 daily parking fee for all vehicles entering the resort, unless you are:
A Club Lanier Islands Member
Staying overnight—one car parking fee is included with your reservation.
Attending a wedding, conference, group meeting, or another resort event such as Easter, Mother’s Day, or Thanksgiving Brunch—the parking fee is included.
Dining at Sidney’s Restaurant—the parking fee is waived with a confirmed reservation.
Playing golf—your parking fee is included with your confirmed tee time.
A Margaritaville at Lanier Islands Season Pass Holder.
Purchase a Club Membership for $100 and enjoy one full year of free parking/entry to Lanier Islands.
BUY NOW
Pet Friendly
At our resort, we believe that a true family vacation involves everyone, including our guests and their beloved pets. That's why we take pride in being one of the most pet-friendly resorts in Georgia. At Legacy Lodge and LakeHouses at Legacy, we warmly welcome your furry family members, ensuring that no one is left behind.
We genuinely value the presence of both our human and animal guests, and we are committed to providing a delightful stay for all.
Learn more
History
The year 1962 marked a pivotal moment when the splendor and promise of four partially flooded mountaintops on Lake Lanier were recognized. Thus, the Lake Lanier Islands Development Authority (LLIDA) came into existence, spearheading the transformation of Lanier Islands into the extraordinary recreational haven it is today. By 1969, the iconic bridge to Lake Lanier Islands Resort was completed, while the '70s witnessed significant infrastructure development, shaping the resort into the remarkable destination it has become.
learn more
ADA Facilities
At Lanier Islands, we prioritize accessibility to ensure a comfortable stay for all guests. Our ADA accommodations include accessible room types like the Legacy Lodge Accessible King, Legacy Villa Accessible Suite, and Accessible Lake House. Guide dogs and service animals are welcome, and our staff is trained to assist guests with visual impairments. Additionally, we offer wheelchair assistance, golf carts for transportation, Braille signage, and more to enhance the experience for every visitor with accessibility needs.
Learn more
Wedding Services
Lanier Islands features a highly experienced professional staff dedicated to making your wedding day perfect. With years of expertise in planning and executing weddings, our team ensures every detail is flawless. From stunning lakeside venues to personalized services, our seasoned staff will bring your dream wedding to life. Trust our wedding experts to handle every aspect, so you can relax and enjoy your special day at Lanier Islands.
LEARN MORE
Group Meeting Experts
Lanier Islands provides top-notch professional services for group meetings, making it the ideal destination for corporate events and conferences in Georgia. With a range of versatile meeting spaces, advanced technology, and a dedicated team of event planners, we ensure your group meeting is seamless and successful. Whether you're hosting a corporate retreat or a large conference, our experienced staff delivers personalized support and exceptional hospitality, allowing you to focus on your business goals while we handle every detail.
LEARN MORE
Transportation
Trolley
Hop on board our complimentary trolley to get you easily to your next stop around the resort. The trolley makes stops at Legacy Lodge, Legacy LakeHouses, the Margaritaville RV Resort, our newest entertainment venue Game Changer & the water park/snow park (when in season) at Margaritaville.
Trolley Available Thursday-Saturday for overnight guests. (Schedule will change seasonally).
Large Groups please contact your Sales Manager for information on Trolley rental for event transportation.
Flying into Atlanta?
Through preferred vendors, Lanier Islands provides chauffeured transportation to and from the airport 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. A wide range of chauffeur-driven vehicles include sedans, SUVs, luxury limousines, vans, mini-buses, coaches, and more.
For Lanier Island rates, please contact
Cooper-Global
or
Strictly Business
directly.
Cooper Global:
770-455-9600
Strictly Business:
770-925-2900
VIP Tours & Shuttle Service
Our shuttle bus provides VIP tours and transportation services around the Islands with seating for up 13 passengers. We also offer transportation services around the Islands in our large passenger vans with seating for up to 10 people and minivans with seating for up to 6 people. Contact your Group Sales Manager for more details.
Resort Carts
Lanier Islands Resort Carts offer both four-seat and six-seat size options and are the perfect way to zip around our 1,200-acre playground for the spirit. Whether you want to explore the Legacy, Pine, and Blue Ridge Islands, or you’re heading over to Legacy Golf Course for a game, nothing gets you there better than a resort cart.
BOOK 4-SEATER
BOOK 6-SEATER
Previous
Next
Previous
Next
Lanier Islands Gift Cards
Give your loved ones the gift of a getaway with a Lanier Islands eGift Card. Available via online ordering in any dollar amount. Gift Cards are currently available as a convenient eGift Card that will be sent to the recipient via email. Physical Gift Cards will be available soon. Lanier Islands eGift Cards are redeemable at Legacy Lodge, all Legacy Lodge restaurants, Tranquility Spa, Legacy Golf Course and Game Changer. Gift Cards are NOT redeemable at Margaritaville parks, restaurants, concessions or Private House Boat Rentals
Purchase gift cards
Make a Quick & Easy Getaway
Directions & Maps
Need Lanier Islands directions? We have you covered. From Atlanta, head north for just under an hour. Take Interstate 85-North to 985-North. Exit on Lanier Islands Pkwy (Exit number 8). From the off-ramp, make a left at the traffic light to merge onto Lanier Islands Parkway. This road will lead you to Lanier Islands. See you at the lake!
Download resort map
Our Address:
Lanier Islands
7000 Lanier Islands Parkway, Buford, GA 30518
770-945-8787
GPS Coordinates:
Latitude: 34.172322
Longitude: -84.006960

CELEBRATE EVERY SEASON WITH US!
Winter, spring, summer, or fall — there’s always something exciting happening here! From festive holiday feasts to splashy summer fun, our special events are packed with family-friendly experiences you won’t want to miss.
Labor Day Weekend
Soak up the final days of summer with a long weekend full of fun. Enjoy a classic poolside cookout at Legacy Lodge, experience tropical vibes at the Game Changer Luau, and explore even more family-friendly activities across the resort. From lakeside relaxation to exciting games and festive events, it’s the perfect holiday escape close to home.
LEARN MORE
2nd Annual Fall Classic
Swing into fall at the 2nd Annual Lanier Islands Resort Fall Classic! Tee off at the stunning Legacy Golf Course in a Two-Player Best Ball event with Gross & Net Flights. Enjoy delicious food, refreshing drinks, fun contests, and a memorable day on the greens!
Learn More
Monster Mash
Join us for a night of frightful fun at this free, family-friendly Halloween party! Enjoy trunk-or-treating, games, music, tasty bites, and a costume contest with awesome prizes. Costumes encouraged—candy guaranteed!
LEARN MORE
Cloudland Wine Dinner
Savor a locally sourced, chef-curated dinner perfectly paired with Cloudland’s handcrafted wines—each course designed to highlight the flavors of the region.
LEARN MORE
Thanksgiving Buffet
Gather your loved ones and enjoy a delicious Thanksgiving Buffet filled with all your holiday favorites—without lifting a finger. From savory entrées to decadent desserts, it’s a festive dining experience you won’t want to miss.
LEARN MORE
Santa's Magical Arrival
Kick off the holiday season with a visit from Santa himself! Enjoy cheerful fun with Santa’s elves, holiday crafts, caroling by Voices of North Georgia, a DJ dance party, festive food and drinks, and all your Game Changer favorites—arcade games, duckpin bowling, and more!
LEARN MORE
Christmas at Lanier Islands Resort
Celebrate the season with twinkling lights, magical snowfall, visits with Santa, and festive holiday fun for the whole family—right on the lake!
LEARN MORE
New Year's Eve
Ring in the New Year your way—with a family-friendly party at Game Changer or a Havana themed celebration with dinner, dancing, and a midnight toast at Legacy Lodge. It’s the perfect NYE getaway near Atlanta!
LEARN MORE
CELEBRATE EVERY SEASON WITH US!
Winter, spring, summer, or fall — there’s always something exciting happening here! From festive holiday feasts to splashy summer fun, our special events are packed with family-friendly experiences you won’t want to miss.

LEARN MORE
2nd Annual Fall Classic
Swing into fall at the 2nd Annual Lanier Islands Resort Fall Classic! Tee off at the stunning Legacy Golf Course in a Two-Player Best Ball event with Gross & Net Flights. Enjoy delicious food, refreshing drinks, fun contests, and a memorable day on the greens!
Learn More
Monster Mash
Join us for a night of frightful fun at this free, family-friendly Halloween party! Enjoy trunk-or-treating, games, music, tasty bites, and a costume contest with awesome prizes. Costumes encouraged—candy guaranteed!
LEARN MORE
Cloudland Wine Dinner
Savor a locally sourced, chef-curated dinner perfectly paired with Cloudland’s handcrafted wines—each course designed to highlight the flavors of the region.
LEARN MORE
Thanksgiving Buffet
Gather your loved ones and enjoy a delicious Thanksgiving Buffet filled with all your holiday favorites—without lifting a finger. From savory entrées to decadent desserts, it’s a festive dining experience you won’t want to miss.
LEARN MORE
Santa's Magical Arrival
Kick off the holiday season with a visit from Santa himself! Enjoy cheerful fun with Santa’s elves, holiday crafts, caroling by Voices of North Georgia, a DJ dance party, festive food and drinks, and all your Game Changer favorites—arcade games, duckpin bowling, and more!
LEARN MORE
Christmas at Lanier Islands Resort
Celebrate the season with twinkling lights, magical snowfall, visits with Santa, and festive holiday fun for the whole family—right on the lake!
LEARN MORE
New Year's Eve
Ring in the New Year your way—with a family-friendly party at Game Changer or a Havana themed celebration with dinner, dancing, and a midnight toast at Legacy Lodge. It’s the perfect NYE getaway near Atlanta!
LEARN MORE
